text: Is there a way to allow for access to a membership area without creating an account, or not requiring a password and still allowing access based on a list?

Not really. I mean you could create a password protected page, and send out an email with that password to the users on a list. That said itâ€™s not as secure as any one of those people could share the password.
If security is important I would use the memberships feature.
What I suspected, thanks for verifying Jon
